name: Magic Seeker: a mimic's odyssey - chapter 1
name_original: Magic Seeker: a mimic's odyssey - chapter 1
description:
Welcome to the world of "MAGIKA".
Adventure yourself in a land filled with mystery, magic and most of all "mimics".

Unravel the mystery around your amnesia by exploring and fighting incredible turn-base fights, but be carfull, the enemys might be "ANYTHING".
